title: The Howl of a Wolf
description: The year is 2049.In a world of demons. Marcus Eridighan, is a pureblood Lycanthrope Prince. His people the Lycanthrope were created specifically to Hunt runaway demons from the ground. Even when they morphed as Humans that was their one purpose. The problem is, Marcus doesn’t believe that hunting is the only purpose the Lycanthrope—his people were given. Upon meeting, Genevieve, a pureblood Vampyrus, confirms the course of his beliefs, extensively. When Marcus’s mother goes missing along with the Codex of Innocence—a powerful holy relic. Love and responsibility becomes something he never expected to be carry.“Our only purpose isn’t to hunt but to keep the peace.”
author: Kia Scarlette
